product_name: Rossignol Scimitar Xelium Skis with Bindings - Juniors' - 2011/2012
long_description: From first timers to progressing intermediates, the Rossignol Scimitar Xelium skis with bindings inspire confidence and control in up-and-coming junior skiers. Stable and forgiving, Rossignol Scimitar Xelium skis with bindings encourage skill progression; ideal for groomed trails at low to medium speeds. Cap construction keeps skis light and fun and boosts durability. Forgiving microcell-foam core won't punish a developing skier for small mistakes yet it's responsive enough to encourage skill progression. Comp Kid 45 bindings feature lightweight composite materials that ease turn transitions and make carrying skis a breeze. Design makes it easy to step into and exit the bindings, so kids can get in and out of their skis quickly. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo. DIN range of 0.75 - 4.5.
short_description: From first timers to progressing intermediates, the Rossignol Scimitar Xelium skis with bindings inspire confidence and control in up-and-coming junior skiers.
